wa-alladhina kadhabu biayatina waliqai l-akhirati habitat aʿmaluhum hal yuj'zawna illa ma kanu yaʿmaluna

walamma rajaʿa musa ila qawmihi ghadbana asifan qala bi'sama khalaftumuni min baʿdi aʿajil'tum amra rabbikum wa-alqa l-alwaha wa-akhadha birasi akhihi yajurruhu ilayhi qala ib'na umma inna l-qawma is'tadʿafuni wakadu yaqtulunani fala tush'mit biya l-aʿdaa wala tajʿalni maʿa l-qawmi l-zalimina

alladhina yattabiʿuna l-rasula l-nabiya l-umiya alladhi yajidunahu maktuban ʿindahum fi l-tawrati wal-injili yamuruhum bil-maʿrufi wayanhahum ʿani l-munkari wayuhillu lahumu l-tayibati wayuharrimu ʿalayhimu l-khabaitha wayadaʿu ʿanhum is'rahum wal-aghlala allati kanat ʿalayhim fa-alladhina amanu bihi waʿazzaruhu wanasaruhu wa-ittabaʿu l-nura alladhi unzila maʿahu ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna

walaw ʿalima l-lahu fihim khayran la-asmaʿahum walaw asmaʿahum latawallaw wahum muʿ'riduna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu is'tajibu lillahi walilrrasuli idha daʿakum lima yuh'yikum wa-iʿ'lamu anna l-laha yahulu bayna l-mari waqalbihi wa-annahu ilayhi tuh'sharuna
wa-ittaqu fit'natan la tusibanna alladhina zalamu minkum khassatan wa-iʿ'lamu anna l-laha shadidu l-ʿiqabi
wa-udh'kuru idh antum qalilun mus'tadʿafuna fi l-ardi takhafuna an yatakhattafakumu l-nasu faawakum wa-ayyadakum binasrihi warazaqakum mina l-tayibati laʿallakum tashkuruna
yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takhunu l-laha wal-rasula watakhunu amanatikum wa-antum taʿlamuna
wa-iʿ'lamu annama amwalukum wa-awladukum fit'natun wa-anna l-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿazimun
yaayyuha alladhina amanu in tattaqu l-laha yajʿal lakum fur'qanan wayukaffir ʿankum sayyiatikum wayaghfir lakum wal-lahu dhu l-fadli l-ʿazimi
wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhina kafaru liyuth'bituka aw yaqtuluka aw yukh'rijuka wayamkuruna wayamkuru l-lahu wal-lahu khayru l-makirina
wa-idha tut'la ʿalayhim ayatuna qalu qad samiʿ'na law nashau laqul'na mith'la hadha in hadha illa asatiru l-awalina
wa-idh qalu l-lahuma in kana hadha huwa l-haqa min ʿindika fa-amtir ʿalayna hijaratan mina l-samai awi i'tina biʿadhabin alimin
wama kana l-lahu liyuʿadhibahum wa-anta fihim wama kana l-lahu muʿadhibahum wahum yastaghfiruna
wama lahum alla yuʿadhibahumu l-lahu wahum yasudduna ʿani l-masjidi l-harami wama kanu awliyaahu in awliyauhu illa l-mutaquna walakinna aktharahum la yaʿlamuna
wama kana salatuhum ʿinda l-bayti illa mukaan watasdiyatan fadhuqu l-ʿadhaba bima kuntum takfuruna
inna alladhina kafaru yunfiquna amwalahum liyasuddu ʿan sabili l-lahi fasayunfiqunaha thumma takunu ʿalayhim hasratan thumma yugh'labuna wa-alladhina kafaru ila jahannama yuh'sharuna
liyamiza l-lahu l-khabitha mina l-tayibi wayajʿala l-khabitha baʿdahu ʿala baʿdin fayarkumahu jamiʿan fayajʿalahu fi jahannama ulaika humu l-khasiruna
qul lilladhina kafaru in yantahu yugh'far lahum ma qad salafa wa-in yaʿudu faqad madat sunnatu l-awalina
waqatiluhum hatta la takuna fit'natun wayakuna l-dinu kulluhu lillahi fa-ini intahaw fa-inna l-laha bima yaʿmaluna basirun
